attributes.title: SADASHIVOHAM 2016, the Historical Spiritual Event for Planet Earth
attributes.description:
Bengaluru Aadheenam is the most happening spiritual city in the world. We are moving planets to make Sadashivoham 2016 happen,” 
declares Paramahamsa Nithyananda. From all corners of the earth, the materials are arriving for Paramahamsa Nithyananda to create 
the Spiritual Alchemy Products, on a mass scale! And to commemorate Sadashivoahm 2016, carving for the world’s largest granite deity 
will begin soon. Paramahamsa Nithyananda also shares that, “All Gods and Goddesses getting invoked to prepare. Don’t miss the most 
exciting, highest spiritual explosion!”  

(October 14, 2016)
www.bit.ly/sadashivoham2016
